meanings.definition: Substances that induce the formation of precipitins.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study different precipitinogens to understand how they trigger the creation of precipitins.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician identified the precipitinogens in the blood sample.
meanings.sent3: The precipitinogens in the experiment decided to throw a party to celebrate their role in science.
meanings.sent4: The precipitinogens acted like conductors, orchestrating the symphony of precipitin formation.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the precipitinogens danced, guiding the antibodies to their destination.

meanings.definition: Antigens that cause the production of precipitins.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained how the specific precipitinogens triggered the immune response.
meanings.sent2: The vaccine contained harmless precipitinogens to stimulate antibody production.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous precipitinogens played hide-and-seek with the immune system.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against infection, the precipitinogens were the generals leading the charge.
meanings.sent5: The classroom model demonstrated how precipitinogens interact with antibodies in the body.
